subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Third baseman Mike Lowell left in the top of the fifth inning with a bruised left hand. Right fielder J. D. Drew left in the top of the sixth with a strained right hamstring.
snippet: Third baseman Mike Lowell left in the top of the fifth inning with a bruised left hand. Right fielder J. D. Drew left in the top of the sixth with a strained right hamstring.
